About Us

PTS Painting Ltd. Is locally owned and operated by Davor Capko and Janko Capko. Established in 2010 in Saskatoon,Sk with over 40 years of Painting experience we bring precision, professionalism and customer satisfaction! With honest estimates and friendly employees look no further for your painting needs.
